description:
Studio apartment on Park Avenue. Furnished with king bed, cable television with Apple TV, stainless steel appliances in the fully stocked kitchen, and brand new bathroom. Amenities include a pool, lounge, and doorman.

Studio apartment with a king bed and high end furniture. Enjoy brand new, luxury appliances in a fully stocked kitchen as well as a brand new bathroom with Kohler fixtures. The unit is equipped with high speed wifi, cable and Apple television, and central air.

Guests have access to the apartment as well as the amenities that are offered in the building.

The apartment is located on Park Avenue South next to Madison Square Park. The neighborhood is nearby NoMad, Gramercy Park, and Union Square. The area is in close proximity to restaurants, nightlife, shopping, parks, and numerous transportation options.

Steps from the 6 and the N-Q-R trains as well as the PATH train. Very close to the 7 train.
name: Studio Apartment in Flatiron
review: Ashley was a great host. She was very quick to respond to any questions. The apt is as described and clean. One thing to note, Verizon cell service does not seem to work once in the apartment.
